DOC.brief_summary: HPV infection is associated with cervical and other anogenital cancers. HPV may also be associated with the development of prostate cancer. The purpose of the study is to determine the prevalence of HPV infection in men living in South Dakota.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Human Papillomavirus in Men Living in the Northern Plains
DOC.criteria: Male Ages 1865 Living in South Dakota (AKA Northern Plains)
